leve.name: Bleeding Out
leve.description: A particularly bloody encounter with the Horde has left scores of our knights fighting for their lives. If we are to save them, we must replenish our stores of a blood-staunching draft, the brewing of which requires the root of a bush called Thaliak's thumb. Go to the Dravanian hinterlands and harvest as many of these roots as you can.
leve.client: Temple Knights Hospitalier Captain Abel Whitecape
